Name: footnoted
Text: Instead of my normal #fridaynightdump, I visited a real dump last night. Well, technically a recycling facility. Th… https://t.co/rum0VZrpZ7
clean_text: NORMAL #FRIDAYNIGHTDUMP VISITED DUMP WELL TECHNICALLY RECYCLING FACILITY

Name: footnoted
Text: @Nonrelatedsense It handles recycling for all of Brooklyn, part of Manhattan and part of Queens. Pretty amazing to see all of that stuff.
clean_text: @NONRELATEDSENSE HANDLES RECYCLING BROOKLYN MANHATTAN QUEENS AMAZING STUFF
